verses.verse: Moreover <WG1161>, brethren <WG80>, we do <WG1107> you <WG5213> to wit <WG1107> <WG5719> of the grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> bestowed <WG1325> <WG5772> on <WG1722> the Congregations <WG1577> of Macedonia <WG3109>;

For <WG3754> to <WG2596> their power <WG1411>, I bear record <WG3140> <WG5719>, yea, and <WG2532> beyond <WG5228> their power <WG1411> they were willing of themselves <WG830>;

davvening <WG1189> <WG5740> us <WG2257> with <WG3326> much <WG4183> intreaty <WG3874> that we <WG2248> would receive <WG1209> <WG5664> the gift <WG5485>, and <WG2532> take upon us the fellowship <WG2842> of the ministering <WG1248> to <WG1519> the saints <WG40>.

And <WG2532> this they did, not <WG3756> as <WG2531> we hoped <WG1679> <WG5656>, but <WG235> first <WG4412> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> their own selves <WG1438> to the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> unto us <WG2254> by <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Insomuch <WG1519> that we <WG2248> desired <WG3870> <WG5658> Titus <WG5103>, that <WG2443> as <WG2531> he had begun <WG4278> <WG5662>, so <WG3779> he would <WG2005> also <WG2532> finish <WG2005> <WG5661> in <WG1519> you <WG5209> the same <WG5026> grace <WG5485> also <WG2532>.

Therefore <WG235>, as <WG5618> ye abound <WG4052> <WG5719> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> thing, in faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> utterance <WG3056>, and <WG2532> knowledge <WG1108>, and <WG2532> in all <WG3956> diligence <WG4710>, and <WG2532> in your <WG5216> love <WG26> <WG1537> to <WG1722> us <WG2254>, see that <WG2443> ye abound <WG4052> <WG5725> in <WG1722> this <WG5026> grace <WG5485> also <WG2532>.

I speak <WG3004> <WG5719> not <WG3756> by <WG2596> Mitzvah <WG2003>, but <WG235> by occasion <WG1223> of the forwardness <WG4710> of others <WG2087>, and <WG2532> to prove <WG1381> <WG5723> the sincerity <WG1103> of your <WG5212> love <WG26>.

For <WG1063> ye know <WG1097> <WG5719> the grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, that <WG3754>, though he was <WG5607> <WG5752> rich <WG4145>, yet for <WG1223> your <WG5209> sakes <WG1223> he became poor <WG4433> <WG5656>, that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> through his <WG1565> poverty <WG4432> might be rich <WG4147> <WG5661>.

And <WG2532> herein <WG1722> <WG5129> I give <WG1325> <WG5719> my advice <WG1106>: for <WG1063> this <WG5124> is expedient <WG4851> <WG5719> for you <WG5213>, who <WG3748> have begun before <WG4278> <WG5662>, not <WG3756> only <WG3440> to do <WG4160> <WG5658>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> to be forward <WG2309> <WG5721> a year <WG4070> ago <WG575>.

Now <WG3570> <WG1161> therefore <WG2532> perform <WG2005> <WG5657> the doing <WG4160> <WG5658> of it; that <WG3704> as <WG2509> there was a readiness <WG4288> to will <WG2309> <WG5721>, so <WG3779> there may be a performance <WG2005> <WG5658> also <WG2532> out of <WG1537> that which ye have <WG2192> <WG5721>.

For <WG1063> if there <WG1487> be first <WG4295> <WG5736> a willing mind <WG4288>, it is accepted <WG2144> according to <WG2526> that <WG1437> a man <WG5100> hath <WG2192> <WG5725>, and not <WG3756> according to that <WG2526> he hath <WG2192> <WG5719> not <WG3756>.
For <WG1063> I mean not <WG3756> that <WG2443> other men <WG243> be eased <WG425>, and <WG1161> ye <WG5213> burdened <WG2347>:

But <WG235> by <WG1537> an equality <WG2471>, that now <WG3568> at <WG1722> this time <WG2540> your <WG5216> abundance <WG4051> may be a supply for <WG1519> their <WG1565> want <WG5303>, that <WG2443> their <WG1565> abundance <WG4051> also <WG2532> may be <WG1096> <WG5638> a supply for <WG1519> your <WG5216> want <WG5303>: that <WG3704> there may be <WG1096> <WG5638> equality <WG2471>:

As <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, He that had gathered <WG3588> much <WG4183> had <WG4121> nothing <WG3756> over <WG4121> <WG5656>; and <WG2532> he that had gathered <WG3588> little <WG3641> had <WG1641> no <WG3756> lack <WG1641> <WG5656>.

But <WG1161> thanks <WG5485> be to 'Elohim <WG2316>, which <WG3588> put <WG1325> <WG5723> the same <WG846> earnest care <WG4710> into <WG1722> the heart <WG2588> of Titus <WG5103> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>.

For <WG3754> indeed <WG3303> he accepted <WG1209> <WG5662> the exhortation <WG3874>; but <WG1161> being <WG5225> <WG5723> more forward <WG4707>, of his own accord <WG830> he went <WG1831> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>.

And <WG1161> we have sent <WG4842> <WG5656> with <WG3326> him <WG846> the brother <WG80>, whose <WG3739> praise <WG1868> is in <WG1722> the gospel <WG2098> throughout <WG1223> all <WG3956> the Congregations <WG1577>;

And <WG1161> not <WG3756> that only <WG3440>, but <WG235> who was <WG5500> also <WG2532> chosen <WG5500> <WG5685> of <WG5259> the Congregations <WG1577> to travel <WG4898> with us <WG2257> with <WG4862> this <WG5026> grace <WG5485>, which <WG3588> is administered <WG1247> <WG5746> by <WG5259> us <WG2257> to <WG4314> the glory <WG1391> of the same <WG846> YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> declaration of your <WG5216> ready mind <WG4288>:

Avoiding <WG4724> <WG5734> this <WG5124>, that no <WG3361> man <WG5100> should blame <WG3469> <WG5667> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> this <WG5026> abundance <WG100> which <WG3588> is administered <WG1247> <WG5746> by <WG5259> us <WG2257>:
Providing <WG4306> <WG5734> for honest things <WG2570>, not <WG3756> only <WG3440> in the sight <WG1799> of the YY <WG2962>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> in the sight <WG1799> of men <WG444>.

And <WG1161> we have sent <WG4842> <WG5656> with them <WG846> our <WG2257> brother <WG80>, whom <WG3739> we have <WG1381> oftentimes <WG4178> proved <WG1381> <WG5656> <WG5607> <WG5752> diligent <WG4705> in <WG1722> many things <WG4183>, but <WG1161> now <WG3570> much <WG4183> more diligent <WG4707>, upon the great <WG4183> confidence <WG4006> which <WG3588> I have in <WG1519> you <WG5209>.

Whether <WG1535> any do enquire of <WG5228> Titus <WG5103>, he is my <WG1699> partner <WG2844> and <WG2532> fellowhelper <WG4904> concerning <WG1519> you <WG5209>: or <WG1535> our <WG2257> brethren <WG80> be enquired of, they are the messengers <WG652> of the Congregations <WG1577>, and the glory <WG1391> of Moshiach <WG5547>.
